Show off your trivia smarts and prove you're no Dingbat!

Your goal: Fill in the phrases to complete the puzzle.

  • Click up to 10 letters to help you fill in the phrases.
  • After you click on a letter, it “runs” through the puzzle, filling in any space in the 3 phrases in which it belongs.
  • Each Dingbat gem represents a vowel. Figuring out the Dingbat in one phrase will help you crack other phrases. However, each time you play the game, the Dingbats represent different vowels.
  • When you know the answer to a phrase, click the SOLVE button, then type it in by tapping the letters.
  • If you tap the wrong letter, use the Backspace button to remove it.
  • Complete a phrase and you get to select a FREE Dingbat to reveal a vowel on the gameboard.
  • The faster you finish the entire puzzle, the more points you earn!

Scoring

  • Earn 10 points for every consonant revealed when using a ‘Letter Guess.’
  • Earn 500 points for solving a phrase.
  • Earn 200 points for each remaining ‘Letter Guess’ when the game ends.
  • Earn Bonus Points for each second remaining on the timer after you solve all 3 phrases.

Dingbats Tips ‘n’ Tricks

Puzzled over which puzzle style to play? Don't be. Take a peek at some of your choices:

  • Chain Gang: The phrases are linked by shared words.
  • Three of a Kind: Each phrase is related to a shared theme.
  • Finish the Quote: The completed phrases make up a famous quotation.
  • Themed Puzzle: The phrases in the puzzle share a common theme.
